compliant.section: We reserve the right to change the Terms at any time, but if we do, we will bring it to your attention by placing a notice on ifttt.com website, by sending you an email, and/or by some other means.
You may be required to sign up for an account, and select a password and user name (“IFTTT User ID”).
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data

compliant.section: As a condition to using the Service or in order to create certain statements through the Service, you may be required to supply IFTTT with certain registration information, including a valid email address, registration information for mobile phones, other mobile devices, or third-party sites or services you access through IFTTT.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data

compliant.section: You promise to provide us with accurate, complete, and updated registration information about yourself.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data

non_compliant.section: You may not (i) select or use as your username a name of another person with the intent to impersonate that person; or (ii) use as your username a name subject to any rights of a person other than you without appropriate authorization; or (iii) use as your username a name that is otherwise offensive, vulgar or obscene.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data
non_compliant.amend: This section lacks clarity on how it ensures fair and lawful processing of personal data for the purpose it was collected. It should be aligned with GDPR principles.

non_compliant.section: IFTTT reserves the right to refuse registration of, or cancel a username in its discretion.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify the legal basis for processing user data and provide users with the right to object to the processing.

non_compliant.section: You shall not use another user's account or any other person's registration information for the Service, any other mobile phones or other mobile devices, or any third party services you access through the Service, without that person's permission.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data
non_compliant.amend: While this section addresses unauthorized access, it should be strengthened to explicitly mention data security measures taken to protect user data in line with GDPR requirements.

non_compliant.section: Your right to use the Service continues until it is terminated by either party.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify data retention periods and what happens to user data after termination of the service in line with GDPR's data minimization principle.

non_compliant.section: You may terminate by discontinuing use of the Service.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
non_compliant.amend: The policy should explicitly mention the user's right to request deletion of their data and how they can exercise this right.

non_compliant.section: IFTTT may terminate at any time for any reason.
non_compliant.amend: While IFTTT can terminate service, the reason should not contradict GDPR's lawful processing principles. Users should be informed about the grounds for termination.

non_compliant.section: Your use terminates automatically if (i) you violate any term of these Terms, (ii) IFTTT publicly posts a written notice of termination on the Service, (iii) IFTTT sends a written notice of termination to you, or (iv) IFTTT ceases providing access to the Service to you.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state how users will be informed about the termination and its consequences on their data.

non_compliant.section: IFTTT will use reasonable efforts to ensure that the Service is available twenty-four hours a day, seven days a week.
non_compliant.amend: While this section mentions efforts for service availability, it should explicitly address data security measures to protect user data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

non_compliant.section: However, there will be occasions when the Service will be interrupted for maintenance, upgrades and emergency repairs.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should inform users about planned service interruptions and their potential impact on data availability.

non_compliant.section: Every reasonable step will be taken by IFTTT to minimize such disruption where it is within IFTTT's reasonable control.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data protection by design and by default
non_compliant.amend: This section should be more specific about the technical and organizational measures implemented to ensure data protection.

non_compliant.section: You agree that IFTTT will not be liable in any event to you or any other party for any suspension, modification, discontinuance or lack of availability of the Service.
non_compliant.legal provisions: General conditions for imposing administrative fines
non_compliant.amend: While IFTTT can limit liability, it should not exclude or limit it in a way that infringes on the user's rights under GDPR.

non_compliant.section: You shall be responsible for obtaining and maintaining any equipment or ancillary services needed to connect to, access or otherwise use the Service, including, without limitation, mobile phones, modems, hardware, software, data plans, and long distance or local telephone service.
non_compliant.amend: This section is not directly related to data protection and does not require amendment for GDPR compliance.

non_compliant.section: You shall be responsible for ensuring that such equipment or ancillary services are compatible with the Service.
non_compliant.amend: This section is not directly related to data protection and does not require amendment for GDPR compliance.

non_compliant.section: What are my rights in the Service? The materials displayed or performed or available on or through the Service, including, but not limited to, text, graphics, data, articles, photos, images, illustrations, User Submissions (defined below), and so forth (all of the foregoing, the “Content”) are protected by copyright and/or other intellectual property laws.
non_compliant.amend: This section focuses on intellectual property rights and does not require amendment for GDPR compliance.
